name: Writing Simple Expressions: One Step (Words to Expression)

skills.name: Write algebraic expressions with correct algebraic convention

explanations.A: Not quite. This expression would be the sum of 5 and q. Which expression shows the product of 5 and q?
explanations.B: This expression means q to the fifth power. It means q x q x q x q x q. Which expression shows the product of 5 and q?
explanations.C: 5q represents the product of 5 and q, which would be 5 times q.
explanations.D: This expression represents 5 divided by q. Which expression shows 5 times q?

explanations.A: Close! This expression reads "p times 3". Which expression would read 3 times p?
explanations.B: Not quite. This expression would be the sum of 3 and p. Which expression shows the product of 3 and p?
explanations.C: This expression means p to the third power. It means p x p x p. Which expression shows the product of 3 and p?
explanations.D: 3p represents the product of 3 and p, which would be 3 times p.

explanations.A: "6 subtracted from k" means that 6 is being taken away from k. k - 6
explanations.B: Close! This expression reads "k subtracted from 6". Which expression would read "6 subtracted from k"?
explanations.C: This expression means k added to 6. Which expression would mean 6 subtracted from k?
explanations.D: This expression means 6 added to k. Which expression would mean 6 subtracted from k?

explanations.A: Close! This expression reads "4 subtracted from t". Which expression would read "t subtracted from 4"?
explanations.B: This expression means 4 added to t. Which expression would mean t subtracted from 4?
explanations.C: "t subtracted from 4" means that t is being taken away from 4. 4 - t
explanations.D: This expression means t added to 4. Which expression would mean 4 subtracted from t?

explanations.A: Not quite. This expression means 8 is greater than w. We are looking for the expression 8 more than w.
explanations.B: "8 more than w" means w plus 8.
explanations.C: This expression means 8 less than w. Which expression means 8 more than w?
explanations.D: This expression means w is greater than 8. Which expression means 8 more than w?

explanations.A: Not quite. This expression means 5 is greater than q. We are looking for the expression 5 more than q.
explanations.B: This expression means 5 less than q. Which expression means 5 more than q?
explanations.C: "5 more than q" means q plus 5.
explanations.D: This expression means 5 times q. Which expression means 5 more than q?

explanations.A: I think you got confused by this notation. j‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ means the 12th value in the set of values denoted by j. Which expression means j divided by 12?
explanations.B: Close! This expression reads 12 divided by j. Which expression reads j divided by 12?
explanations.C: This expression represents the product of j and 12. Which expression represents j divided by 12?
explanations.D: j divided by 12 can be written in fraction form, with j as the numerator and 12 as the denominator.

explanations.A: Close! This expression reads 7 divided by m. Which expression reads m divided by 7?
explanations.B: This expression represents 7 subtracted from m. Which expression represents m divided by 7?
explanations.C: m divided by 7 can be written in fraction form, with m as the numerator and 7 as the denominator.
explanations.D: This expression represents the product of m and 7. Which expression represents m divided by 7?

explanations.A: This expression is equivalent to 15 multiplied by g. Multiplication is commutative. Which expression does not show 15 times g?
explanations.B: This expression is equivalent to 15 multiplied by g. Parenthesis can be used in place of a multiplication sign. Which expression does not show 15 times g?
explanations.C: This expression is equivalent to 15 multiplied by g. We don't put the multiplication symbol as it may be confused for an ùë•. Which expression does NOT show 15 times g?
explanations.D: This expression is not the same as 15 times g. This expression means 15 to the power of g.

explanations.A: This expression is equivalent to 11 multiplied by y. We don't put the multiplication symbol as it may be confused for an ùë•. Which expression does not show 11 times y?
explanations.B: This expression is not the same as 11 times y. This expression means 11 to the power of y.
explanations.C: This expression is equivalent to 11 multiplied by y. Multiplication is commutative. Which expression does NOT show 11 times y?
explanations.D: This expression is equivalent to 11 multiplied by y. Parenthesis can be used in place of a multiplication sign. Which expression does not show 11 times y?
